H0.text: A face mask will help a student conduct an investigation testing a material's effectiveness as a heat insulator safely.

H1.text: Plastic gloves will help the student conduct the investigation testing a material's effectiveness as a heat insulator safely.

H2.text: A ventilator hood will help the student conduct the investigation of a material's effectiveness as a heat insulator safely.

H3.text: Insulated gloves are the tool that will help a student safely conduct an investigation testing a material's effectiveness as a heat insulator.

A4.text: Thermal insulators are materials specifically designed to reduce the flow of heat by limiting conduction, convection, or both.
